name: Folder II
description:
This is not your average game. For a start, you won't find any executable in this download. Just lots and lots of FOLDERS. All you need is time, patience, a bit of luck and a File Explorer and you're good to go!

The sequel to unpopular Folder (smaller if you don't have much space). 

This is a winding labyrinth of folders that you could go back to day after day and find something new every time. No game-play, just exploration in the weirdest way.  

Find all the memes to unzip The Holy Zipped Folder. Store your memes in a secure location. Decode them. Bring about the truth.

Or you could just search for orgy sound effects from the BBC (no joke, that's a thing).

Either way, it's up to you what you find in FOLDER.

Features:

  • Basically infinite game-play
  • Over 2 million, 3 thousand folders to explore (that's a lot)
  • Memes
  • 10 hours of Kahoot Mii mashup song
